articles.description: The Team GB cyclists were among 78 Olympians and Paralympians included on the New Year's honours list following their latest success in Tokyo.
articles.content:
Sir Jason and Dame Laura Kenny revealed they accidentally ignored the email that offered them their honours.

articles.title: Report says Erling Haaland has told random fans where he will play next season - TEAMtalk
articles.description: Goalscoring sensation Erling Haaland has reportedly told some random fans in Marbella that he will "play in Spain" next season.
articles.content:
Erling Haaland has reportedly told some random fans in Marbella that he will “play in Spain” next season.
